r.s: Wrapper Classes for the RADIUS PECL.
r.d: This package provides wrapper-classes for the RADIUS PECL. There are different Classes for the different authentication methods. If you are using CHAP-MD5 or MS-CHAP you need also the Crypt_CHAP package. If you are using MS-CHAP you need also the mhash and mcrypt extension.
r.n: * Changed the examples for version 1.0.0 of Crypt_CHAP * Added a new class for sending interim accounting updates
